name: ROPAD Parkinson's Patient Referral Triage
description: Triages potential patient referrals from the ROPAD genetics study and forwards them to the BIIB122/DNL151 study team and Biogen partner contacts.

actions.description: Send an automated acknowledgment to the ROPAD site confirming receipt of the referral.
Forward the de-identified patient information to the internal DNL151 team and Biogen contacts for review.

name: Initial SAE Triage for ALS Study (DNL343)
description: Receives SAE reports from clinical sites for the DNL343 study, acknowledges receipt, and forwards them to the internal pharmacovigilance team.

actions.description: Send an automated confirmation to the reporting site that their SAE report has been received.
Forward the complete SAE report to the Denali PV intake group for processing and safety database entry.

name: Site Inquiry Routing
description: Monitors the clinical-trials@dnli.com inbox, categorizes incoming site inquiries, and routes them to the appropriate internal department.

actions.description: Scan email for keywords (e.g., 'protocol', 'payment', 'IRB') and forward to the correct internal team (Clinical Ops, Medical, Finance).
Create a record of the site communication and its routing in the Clinical Trial Management System.

name: Partner Milestone Notification (TAK-594/DNL593)
description: Automates the notification of key study milestones for the TAK-594/DNL593 trial to the Takeda joint project team.

actions.description: Upon receiving an internal trigger, format and send a standardized milestone update email to the Takeda collaboration manager.

name: Pediatric Consent Form Distribution (DNL126)
description: Handles requests from sites for the latest approved pediatric consent and assent forms for the DNL126 (MPS IIIA) study.

actions.description: Reply to the site's request with a secure link to the current, IRB-approved consent/assent form package stored in the eTMF.
